attributes.action: Force the RSPCA to do what they were originally formed to do.
attributes.background: The RSPCA are, at this moment in time, unfit for purpose. The charity is very wealthy and needs to apportion monies donated, in the right areas. This would be on the frontline. This is not why they were founded.

rejection.details:
The RSCPA is a charity, and not part of the UK Government or Parliament. 

You can find out how to make a complaint about a charity here:

https://www.gov.uk/complain-about-charity
